name: flight-mcp-agent
description: Flight search and pricing MCP server using Amadeus API

tools.name: search_flights
tools.description: Search for flights based on trip constraints (origin, destination, dates, passengers)

max_results.description: Maximum number of flight options to return

returns.description: Flight search results with list of flight options, search ID, and total results count

tools.name: get_flight_pricing
tools.description: Get detailed pricing information for specific flight IDs including fare breakdown

flight_ids.description: List of flight IDs to get pricing for

returns.description: Array of pricing details with base fare, taxes, fees, and total cost breakdown

tools.name: get_cached_flights
tools.description: Get cached/demo flight data for testing purposes without API calls

returns.description: Demo flight search results for testing and development

environment_variables.name: AMADEUS_API_KEY
environment_variables.description: Amadeus API key for flight data access

author: YC Hackathon Team
